name: Kako
description: '''Francisco Ángel Bastar''' (June 21, 1936 – July 29, 1994), known as '''Kako''', was a Puerto Rican percussionist and bandleader. He is considered one of the most important ''[[timbalero]]s'' of the incipient [[salsa music|salsa]] of [[New York City]] in the 1960s, especially due to his long-lasting association with [[Alegre Records]].
